Name: Minion Slayer
About the game: Minionslayer is Growth defense game of another genre, added with tower defense, RPG action and strategy. Minionslayer is not just easy game that stimulates desire of challenge. We recommend this game to players who have challenge spirit. We found new world, but this land was already occupied with minions. Drive minions out and occupy a new land. Fight minions with building towers and bases contering around hero. If you think it is easy to kill minions, what about destroying colony?
